de.arm.bot.model

Class Maze

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.arm.bot.model.Maze

  • public class Maze
extends java.lang.Object
    A class representing the Maze with its cells and its player
    Author:
    Team ARM

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Cell[][] cells
      The cells which the maze contains, indexed by [x][y]
      private int height
      The height of the maze
      private int length
      The length of the maze
      private Player player
      The player used for identifying the bots current position in the maze

      • getDistance

        public int getDistance(Cell from,
                       Cell to)
        Calculates the estimated distance between the two given cells. Also calculates the distance using the wrap functionality if it is possible to wrap. If it is possible to wrap on all for directions, five different distances will be calculated Returned will be the lowest calculated distance
        Parameters:
        from - The first cell
        to - The second cell
        Returns:
        The calculated lowest distance

      • calculateDistance

                              Cell to,
                              Direction direction)
        Calculates the distance (x or y) between the given cells using the given direction
        Parameters:
        from - The first cell
        to - The second cell
        direction - The given direction
        Returns:
        The calculated distance

      • canWrap

        private boolean canWrap(Direction direction,
                        int on)
        Checks whether it is possible to wrap (the last cell of the specified row/column is navigable)
        Parameters:
        direction - The given Direction
        on - The index of the row/column to check
        Returns:
        True, if it is possible to wrap

        public int adjustForLevel3or9(Status westStatus)
